clinical_study.brief_title: ATLANTIS:Extensive Type A Dissections and Thoracic/ Thoraco-Abdominal Aneurysms Repair With LupiAe Hybrid TechNique
clinical_study.official_title: Extensive Type A Dissections and Thoracic/ Thoraco-Abdominal

lead_sponsor.agency: Azienda Ospedaliera Universitaria di Bologna Policlinico S. Orsola Malpighi

clinical_study.source: Azienda Ospedaliera Universitaria di Bologna Policlinico S. Orsola Malpighi

brief_summary.textblock:
To prospectively evaluate the safety and efficacy of the LUPIAE hybrid technique for the treatment of
- thoracic or thoraco-abdominal aortic aneurysms
- thoracic aortic type A dissections 2. to compare the safety and efficacy of the LUPIAE hybrid technique with historical groups (literature review, other hybrid techniques, LUPIAE retrospective patients)

detailed_description.textblock:
LUPIAE technique:
Hybrid repair of thoracic or thoraco-abdominal aneurysms of different etiology and type A dissections with a two-stage procedure:
1. surgical arch reconstruction with a Dacron multibranched surgical prothesis
2. endovascular implantation of a thoracic stent graft

clinical_study.why_stopped: The study never started since our Medical Ethic Commeettee did not approved it

intervention.description: it's a new hybrid technique for the treatment of aortic aneurism and dissection.
